text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara yakhana mumina naridera bibaha karo ebam tadera sparsa karara age'i yadi tadera tomara talaka diye da'o, tahale tomadera jan'ya tadera upare iddatera kono-kichu nirdharana karabara thakabe na, kintu tadera jan'ya sansthana karo ebam tadera bidaya diyo saujan'yamaya bidayadane.
